meanings.definition: To make (someone) familiar with or accustomed to something.
meanings.sent1: She is familiarizing her new friend with the school layout.
meanings.sent2: I am familiarizing myself with the new computer software.
meanings.sent3: The cat is familiarizing itself with the new scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The young bird is familiarizing itself with the feeling of flight.
meanings.sent5: He spent hours familiarizing himself with the ancient map.

meanings.sent1: After a few days, she was familiarizing herself with the city streets.
meanings.sent2: The students are familiarizing themselves with the new math concepts.
meanings.sent3: The robot is familiarizing itself with human emotions in a humorous way.
meanings.sent4: The explorer was familiarizing himself with the dangers of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The detective was familiarizing himself with the suspect's alibi.
